verses.verse: And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, if<WH518> you shall listen<WH8085> diligently to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to observe<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> his commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> that the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> will set<WH5414> you on<WH5921> high<WH5945> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> of the earth:<WH776>

And all<WH3605> these<WH428> blessings<WH1293> shall come<WH935> on<WH5921> you, and overtake<WH5381> you, if<WH3588> you shall listen<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Blessed<WH1288> shall you be in the city,<WH5892> and blessed<WH1288> shall you be in the field.<WH7704>

Blessed<WH1288> shall be the fruit<WH6529> of your body,<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of your ground,<WH127> and the fruit<WH6529> of your cattle,<WH929> the increase<WH7698> of your cows,<WH504> and the flocks<WH6251> of your sheep.<WH6629>
Blessed<WH1288> shall be your basket<WH2935> and your store.<WH4863>
Blessed<WH1288> shall you be when you come<WH935> in, and blessed<WH1288> shall you be when you go<WH3318> out.

The LORD<WH3068> shall cause<WH5414> your enemies<WH341> that rise<WH6965> up against<WH5921> you to be smitten<WH5062> before your face: they shall come<WH3318> out against<WH413> you one<WH259> way,<WH1870> and flee<WH5127> before<WH6440> you seven<WH7651> ways.<WH1870>

The LORD<WH3068> shall command<WH6680> the blessing<WH1293> on you in your storehouses,<WH618> and in all<WH3605> that you set<WH4916> your hand<WH3027> to; and he shall bless<WH1288> you in the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you.

The LORD<WH3068> shall establish<WH6965> you an holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> to himself, as he has sworn<WH7650> to you, if<WH3588> you shall keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and walk<WH1980> in his ways.<WH1870>
And all<WH3605> people<WH5971> of the earth<WH776> shall see<WH7200> that you are called<WH7121> by the name<WH8034> of the LORD;<WH3068> and they shall be afraid<WH3372> of you.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall make you plenteous<WH3498> in goods,<WH2896> in the fruit<WH6529> of your body,<WH990> and in the fruit<WH6529> of your cattle,<WH929> and in the fruit<WH6529> of your ground,<WH127> in the land<WH127> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> you.

The LORD<WH3068> shall open<WH6605> to you his good<WH2896> treasure,<WH214> the heaven<WH8064> to give<WH5414> the rain<WH4306> to your land<WH776> in his season,<WH6256> and to bless<WH1288> all<WH3605> the work<WH4639> of your hand:<WH3027> and you shall lend<WH3867> to many<WH7227> nations,<WH1471> and you shall not borrow.<WH3867>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall make<WH5414> you the head,<WH7218> and not the tail;<WH2180> and you shall be above<WH4605> only,<WH7535> and you shall not be beneath;<WH4295> if<WH3588> that you listen<WH8085> to the commandments<WH4687> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> to observe<WH8104> and to do<WH6213> them:

And you shall not go<WH5493> aside<WH5493> from any<WH3605> of the words<WH1697> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day,<WH3117> to the right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> or to the left,<WH8040> to go<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to serve<WH5647> them.

But it shall come<WH1961> to pass, if<WH518> you will not listen<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> I command<WH6680> you this day;<WH3117> that all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> on you, and overtake<WH5381> you:
Cursed<WH779> shall you be in the city,<WH5892> and cursed<WH779> shall you be in the field.<WH7704>
Cursed<WH779> shall be your basket<WH2935> and your store.<WH4863>
Cursed<WH779> shall be the fruit<WH6529> of your body,<WH990> and the fruit<WH6529> of your land,<WH127> the increase<WH7698> of your cows,<WH504> and the flocks<WH6251> of your sheep.<WH6629>
Cursed<WH779> shall you be when you come<WH935> in, and cursed<WH779> shall you be when you go<WH3318> out.

The LORD<WH3068> shall send<WH7971> on you cursing,<WH3994> vexation,<WH4103> and rebuke,<WH4045> in all<WH3605> that you set<WH4916> your hand<WH3027> to for to do,<WH6213> until<WH5704> you be destroyed,<WH8045> and until<WH5704> you perish<WH6> quickly;<WH4118> because<WH6440> of the wickedness<WH7455> of your doings,<WH4611> whereby<WH834> you have forsaken<WH5800> me.

The LORD<WH3068> shall make the pestilence<WH1698> stick<WH1692> to you, until<WH5704> he have consumed<WH3615> you from off<WH5921> the land,<WH127> where<WH834> <WH8033> you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> you with a consumption,<WH7829> and with a fever,<WH6920> and with an inflammation,<WH1816> and with an extreme<WH2746> burning,<WH2746> and with the sword,<WH2719> and with blasting,<WH7711> and with mildew;<WH3420> and they shall pursue<WH7291> you until<WH5704> you perish.<WH6>
And your heaven<WH8064> that is over<WH5921> your head<WH7218> shall be brass,<WH5178> and the earth<WH776> that is under<WH8478> you shall be iron.<WH1270>

The LORD<WH3068> shall make<WH5414> the rain<WH4306> of your land<WH776> powder<WH80> and dust:<WH6083> from heaven<WH8064> shall it come<WH3381> down<WH3381> on you, until<WH5704> you be destroyed.<WH8045>

The LORD<WH3068> shall cause<WH5414> you to be smitten<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies:<WH341> you shall go<WH3318> out one<WH259> way<WH1870> against<WH413> them, and flee<WH5127> seven<WH7651> ways<WH1870> before<WH6440> them: and shall be removed<WH2189> into all<WH3605> the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth.<WH776>
And your carcass<WH5038> shall be meat<WH3978> to all<WH3605> fowls<WH5775> of the air,<WH8064> and to the beasts<WH929> of the earth,<WH776> and no<WH369> man shall fray<WH2729> them away.

The LORD<WH3068> will smite<WH5221> you with the botch<WH7822> of Egypt,<WH4714> and with the tumors,<WH6076> and with the scab,<WH1618> and with the itch,<WH2775> whereof<WH834> you can<WH3201> not be healed.<WH7495>
The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> you with madness,<WH7697> and blindness,<WH5788> and astonishment<WH8541> of heart:<WH3824>

And you shall grope<WH4959> at noonday,<WH6672> as the blind<WH5787> gropes<WH4959> in darkness,<WH653> and you shall not prosper<WH6743> in your ways:<WH1870> and you shall be only<WH389> oppressed<WH6231> and spoiled<WH1497> ever more,<WH3605> <WH3117> and no<WH369> man shall save<WH3467> you.

You shall betroth<WH781> a wife,<WH802> and another<WH312> man<WH376> shall lie<WH7693> with her: you shall build<WH1129> an house,<WH1004> and you shall not dwell<WH3427> therein: you shall plant<WH5193> a vineyard,<WH3754> and shall not gather<WH2490> the grapes thereof.

Your ox<WH7794> shall be slain<WH2873> before your eyes,<WH5869> and you shall not eat<WH398> thereof: your ass<WH2543> shall be violently<WH1497> taken<WH1497> away from before your face, and shall not be restored<WH7725> to you: your sheep<WH6629> shall be given<WH5414> to your enemies,<WH341> and you shall have none<WH369> to rescue<WH3467> them.

Your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> shall be given<WH5414> to another<WH312> people,<WH5971> and your eyes<WH5869> shall look,<WH7200> and fail<WH3615> with longing for them all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> long; and there shall be no<WH369> might<WH410> in your hand.<WH3027>

The fruit<WH6529> of your land,<WH127> and all<WH3605> your labors,<WH3018> shall a nation<WH5971> which<WH834> you know<WH3045> not eat<WH398> up; and you shall be only<WH389> oppressed<WH6231> and crushed<WH7533> always:<WH3605>
So that you shall be mad<WH7696> for the sight<WH4758> of your eyes<WH5869> which<WH834> you shall see.<WH7200>

The LORD<WH3068> shall smite<WH5221> you in the knees,<WH1290> and in the legs,<WH7785> with a sore<WH7451> botch<WH7822> that cannot<WH3808> <WH3201> be healed,<WH7495> from the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> to the top<WH6936> of your head.<WH6936>

The LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH3212> you, and your king<WH4428> which<WH834> you shall set<WH6965> over<WH5921> you, to a nation<WH1471> which neither<WH3808> you nor your fathers<WH1> have known;<WH3045> and there<WH8033> shall you serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>
And you shall become<WH1961> an astonishment,<WH8047> a proverb,<WH4912> and a byword,<WH8148> among all<WH3605> nations<WH5971> where<WH834> <WH8033> the LORD<WH3068> shall lead<WH5090> you.
You shall carry<WH3318> much<WH7227> seed<WH2233> out into the field,<WH7704> and shall gather<WH622> but little<WH4592> in; for the locust<WH697> shall consume<WH2628> it.

You shall plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> and dress<WH5647> them, but shall neither<WH3808> drink<WH8354> of the wine,<WH3196> nor<WH3808> gather<WH103> the grapes; for the worms<WH8438> shall eat<WH398> them.
You shall have olive<WH2132> trees throughout all<WH3605> your coasts,<WH1366> but you shall not anoint<WH5480> yourself with the oil;<WH8081> for your olive<WH2132> shall cast<WH5394> his fruit.
You shall beget<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters,<WH1323> but you shall not enjoy<WH1961> them; for they shall go<WH3212> into captivity.<WH7628>
All<WH3605> your trees<WH6086> and fruit<WH6529> of your land<WH127> shall the locust<WH6767> consume.<WH3423>
The stranger<WH1616> that is within<WH7130> you shall get<WH5927> up above<WH5921> you very<WH4605> high;<WH4605> and you shall come<WH3381> down<WH3381> very<WH4295> low.<WH4295>
He shall lend<WH3867> to you, and you shall not lend<WH3867> to him: he shall be the head,<WH7218> and you shall be the tail.<WH2180>

Moreover all<WH3605> these<WH428> curses<WH7045> shall come<WH935> on you, and shall pursue<WH7291> you, and overtake<WH5381> you, till<WH5704> you be destroyed;<WH8045> because<WH3588> you listened<WH8085> not to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes<WH2708> which<WH834> he commanded<WH6680> you:
And they shall be on you for a sign<WH226> and for a wonder,<WH4159> and on your seed<WH2233> for ever.<WH5769>
Because<WH8478> <WH834> you served<WH5647> not the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> with joyfulness,<WH8057> and with gladness<WH2898> of heart,<WH3824> for the abundance<WH7230> of all<WH3605> things;

Therefore shall you serve<WH5647> your enemies<WH341> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall send<WH7971> against you, in hunger,<WH7457> and in thirst,<WH6772> and in nakedness,<WH5903> and in want<WH2640> of all<WH3605> things: and he shall put<WH5414> a yoke<WH5923> of iron<WH1270> on your neck,<WH6677> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH8045> you.

The LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH5375> a nation<WH1471> against<WH5921> you from far,<WH7350> from the end<WH7097> of the earth,<WH776> as swift as the eagle<WH5404> flies;<WH1675> a nation<WH1471> whose<WH834> tongue<WH3956> you shall not understand;<WH8085>
A nation<WH1471> of fierce<WH5794> countenance,<WH6440> which<WH834> shall not regard<WH5375> the person<WH6440> of the old,<WH2205> nor<WH3808> show favor<WH2603> to the young:<WH5288>

And he shall eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of your cattle,<WH929> and the fruit<WH6529> of your land,<WH127> until<WH5704> you be destroyed:<WH8045> which<WH834> also shall not leave<WH7604> you either corn,<WH1715> wine,<WH8492> or oil,<WH3323> or the increase<WH7698> of your cows,<WH504> or flocks<WH6251> of your sheep,<WH6629> until<WH5704> he have destroyed<WH6> you.

And he shall besiege<WH6887> you in all<WH3605> your gates,<WH8179> until<WH5704> your high<WH1364> and fenced<WH1219> walls<WH2346> come<WH3381> down,<WH3381> wherein<WH834> <WH2004> you trusted,<WH982> throughout all<WH3605> your land:<WH776> and he shall besiege<WH6887> you in all<WH3605> your gates<WH8179> throughout all<WH3605> your land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you.

And you shall eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of your own body,<WH990> the flesh<WH1320> of your sons<WH1121> and of your daughters,<WH1323> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> has given<WH5414> you, in the siege,<WH4692> and in the narrow place,<WH4689> with which<WH834> your enemies<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> you:

So that the man<WH376> that is tender<WH7390> among you, and very<WH3966> delicate,<WH6028> his eye<WH5869> shall be evil<WH7489> toward his brother,<WH251> and toward the wife<WH802> of his bosom,<WH2436> and toward the remnant<WH3499> of his children<WH1121> which<WH834> he shall leave:<WH3498>

So that he will not give<WH5414> to any<WH259> of them of the flesh<WH1320> of his children<WH1121> whom<WH834> he shall eat:<WH398> because he has nothing<WH3605> left<WH7604> him in the siege,<WH4692> and in the narrow place,<WH4689> with which<WH834> your enemies<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> you in all<WH3605> your gates.<WH8179>

The tender<WH7390> and delicate<WH6028> woman among you, which<WH834> would not adventure<WH5254> to set<WH3322> the sole<WH3709> of her foot<WH7272> on the ground<WH776> for delicateness<WH6026> and tenderness,<WH7391> her eye<WH5869> shall be evil<WH7489> toward the husband<WH376> of her bosom,<WH2436> and toward her son,<WH1121> and toward her daughter,<WH1323>

And toward her young<WH7988> one that comes<WH3318> out from between<WH996> her feet,<WH7272> and toward her children<WH1121> which<WH834> she shall bear:<WH3205> for she shall eat<WH398> them for want<WH2640> of all<WH3605> things secretly<WH5643> in the siege<WH4692> and narrow place,<WH4689> with which<WH834> your enemy<WH341> shall distress<WH6693> you in your gates.<WH8179>

If<WH518> you will not observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> all<WH3605> the words<WH1697> of this<WH2063> law<WH8451> that are written<WH3789> in this<WH2088> book,<WH5612> that you may fear<WH3372> this<WH2088> glorious<WH3513> and fearful<WH3372> name,<WH8034> THE LORD<WH3068> THY GOD;<WH430>

Then the LORD<WH3068> will make<WH6381> your plagues<WH4347> wonderful,<WH6381> and the plagues<WH4347> of your seed,<WH2233> even great<WH1419> plagues,<WH4347> and of long continuance,<WH539> and sore<WH7451> sicknesses,<WH2483> and of long continuance.<WH539>
Moreover he will bring<WH7725> on you all<WH3605> the diseases<WH4064> of Egypt,<WH4714> which<WH834> you were afraid<WH3025> of; and they shall stick<WH1692> to you.

Also<WH1571> every<WH3605> sickness,<WH2483> and every<WH3605> plague,<WH4347> which<WH834> is not written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of this<WH2063> law,<WH8451> them will the LORD<WH3068> bring<WH5927> on you, until<WH5704> you be destroyed.<WH8045>

And you shall be left<WH7604> few<WH4592> in number, whereas<WH834> you were as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude;<WH7230> because<WH3588> you would not obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that as the LORD<WH3068> rejoiced<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to do you good,<WH3190> and to multiply<WH7235> you; so<WH3651> the LORD<WH3068> will rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> you to destroy<WH6> you, and to bring<WH8045> you to nothing;<WH8045> and you shall be plucked<WH5255> from off<WH5921> the land<WH127> where<WH834> <WH8033> you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it.

And the LORD<WH3068> shall scatter<WH6327> you among all<WH3605> people,<WH5971> from the one end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776> even to the other; and there<WH8033> you shall serve<WH5647> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> which<WH834> neither<WH3808> you nor your fathers<WH1> have known,<WH3045> even wood<WH6086> and stone.<WH68>

And among these<WH1992> nations<WH1471> shall you find no<WH3808> ease,<WH7280> neither<WH3808> shall the sole<WH3709> of your foot<WH7272> have<WH1961> rest:<WH4494> but the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> you there<WH8033> a trembling<WH7268> heart,<WH3820> and failing<WH3631> of eyes,<WH5869> and sorrow<WH1671> of mind:<WH5315>
And your life<WH2416> shall hang<WH8511> in doubt before<WH5048> you; and you shall fear<WH6342> day<WH3119> and night,<WH3915> and shall have none<WH3808> assurance<WH539> of your life:<WH2416>

In the morning<WH1242> you shall say,<WH559> Would<WH4310> <WH5414> God it were even!<WH6153> and at even<WH6153> you shall say,<WH559> Would<WH4310> <WH5414> God it were morning!<WH1242> for the fear<WH6343> of your heart<WH3824> with which<WH834> you shall fear,<WH6342> and for the sight<WH4758> of your eyes<WH5869> which<WH834> you shall see.<WH7200>

And the LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH7725> you into Egypt<WH4714> again<WH7725> with ships,<WH591> by the way<WH1870> whereof<WH834> I spoke<WH559> to you, You shall see<WH7200> it no<WH3808> more<WH5750> again:<WH3254> and there<WH8033> you shall be sold<WH4376> to your enemies<WH341> for slaves<WH5650> and bondwomen,<WH8198> and no<WH369> man shall buy<WH7069> you.
